alertDetailsOverride.alertDisplayNameFormat: BitSight: Alert for {{RiskVector}} in {{CompanyName}} from BitSight

properties.name: BitSight - diligence risk category detected
properties.description: 'Rule helps to detect whenever there is a diligence risk category found in BitSight.'
properties.query:
let timeframe = 24h;
BitSightFindingsData
| where ingestion_time() > ago(timeframe)
| where RiskCategory == "Diligence"
| extend Severity = toreal(Severity)
| extend Severity = case( Severity <= 6.9 and Severity >= 4.0, "Low",
                          Severity <= 8.9 and Severity >= 7.0, "Medium",
                          Severity <= 10.0 and Severity >= 9.0, "High",
                          "Informational")
| project FirstSeen, CompanyName, Severity, RiskCategory, TemporaryId, RiskVector
